description: Daniel and Philip were very touchy-feely from the get-go, and very eager to get this thing started. When we asked Philip if he did any research on Daniel, he revealed that he jerked off to his videos. This undoubtedly made Daniel even hornier than he already was to fuck this newbie. “I think that I’m gonna get fucked very well today.” Daniel replied, “Of course I’m gonna fuck you well, man!” Philip continued, “Well, I didn’t come all the way down here to get mediocrely fucked…” That comment prompted Daniel give Philip the pounding of his life…and man, did he ever!
title: Daniel & Philip: Bareback
